title: [求助，楼主都要急出shi了]mac上能玩mc吗？
author: fengyuyang

replies.author: rickky2
replies.txt_content:
Minecraft是用java编写的，所以是跨平台的
下载minecraftsp.jar就可以玩了
http://115.com/file/e6pvzznm

replies.author: green丶bastard
replies.txt_content: mac能玩的 下个minecraftSP.jar 论坛有的
